Our Methodology

A structured process that guarantees measurable results

We don't improvise. Every project follows a proven methodology that combines international standards with our practical experience. Total transparency, realistic timelines, and results you can measure.

4
Structured phases
100%
Traceability
24h
Response time

Work Process

Four phases that transform your security posture

Reconnaissance

1-2 weeks

We identify all assets, services, and possible attack vectors. We gather public information and perform comprehensive attack surface analysis.

Pentesting

2-4 weeks

We execute ethical attacks following OWASP and PTES methodologies. We simulate everything from automated attacks to advanced APT techniques.

Implementation

2-6 weeks

We apply identified fixes following CIS and NIST standards. We configure security controls and establish robust policies.

Maintenance

Ongoing

We establish a continuous monitoring program with periodic reviews, security updates, and response to new threats.

Our Principles

The values that guide every project

Total Transparency

Every process, finding, and recommendation is fully documented. No unnecessary technical jargon, no inflated results.

Practical Approach

We prioritize vulnerabilities by real business impact. Implementable solutions, not theoretical ones.

Continuous Improvement

Cybersecurity is not a project, it's a process. We establish improvement cycles that evolve with threats.

Knowledge Transfer

Your team learns with every project. Practical training that reduces long-term external dependency.

Standards and Certifications

Internationally recognized methodologies

Our work is based on the industry's most rigorous standards. We don't reinvent the wheel: we apply proven methodologies and adapt them to each client's specific needs.

ISO 27001

Information security management

OWASP

Application testing methodologies

NIST

Cybersecurity framework

CIS Controls

Critical security controls

PTES

Penetration testing execution standard

GDPR

European regulatory compliance

Our Commitment

Quality and transparency in every project

Realistic Timelines

Estimates based on real projects. Proactive communication if unexpected issues arise.

Proven Methodology

Processes based on international standards and practical experience from hundreds of projects.

Total Confidentiality

NDA signed before first contact. Your data never leaves our certified systems.

Continuous Support

30 days of post-implementation support included. Guaranteed response in less than 24h.
